title: League FPS drops (Help!)
body:
So windows 8 worked perfect for me then i upgraded to 8.1 where i got BugSplat errors so i factory reset back to 8 where i got d3dx9_39.dll is missing which i fixed but downloading a package from microsoft.

However now i can play fine but i get fps drops/freezes and if i dont connect to an ethernert cable i get 600+ ping.

I have already tried updating my drivers.

Hope you can help, Thanks in advance

replies.body:
Thank for the help guys my fps is fixed now! yay
i reinstalled the game and it seemed to work just fine.

Hey there,

Have you tried reinstalling your network drivers?

Regarding your FPS drops, you said you've tried updating your drivers but have you tried rolling them back? It's possible a newer driver version might be causing you issues.

SephirothSG's statement on the new driver could be causing the issue is also believable/truth. If this was the case I would suggest you to try up my method first of downloading the fix tool from Microsoft http://ccm.net/download/download-14957-microsoft-fix-it and then if the issue continues, roll back to a older version of the driver. Let me know if you need help rolling back to an older driver as I am happy to help :).

Hi friend :) ,

I think your PC may be corrupted or that the registry's might have been damaged. I would suggest you to download this and run it and see if this helps :). 

http://ccm.net/download/download-14957-microsoft-fix-it
